course_details: This course covers the basics of computer science, including algorithms, data structures, and basic programming concepts.
An in-depth look at data structures and algorithms, focusing on practical applications and problem-solving techniques.
Learn the principles of object-oriented programming and how to apply them using popular programming languages like Java and C++.
A comprehensive course on web development covering HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern frameworks like React and Angular.
Explore the concepts of database design, SQL, and database management systems such as MySQL and PostgreSQL.
Learn how to develop mobile applications for both Android and iOS platforms using languages like Kotlin and Swift.
An introduction to artificial intelligence, covering machine learning, neural networks, and AI applications.
Study the principles of cybersecurity, including cryptography, network security, and ethical hacking.
Learn about cloud computing concepts, including cloud infrastructure, services, and deployment models using platforms like AWS and Azure.
